explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a young woman wearing a floral apron and round glasses stands with one hand on her hip, holding a ladle filled with soup. She is looking at a pot of food on the stove, next to which is a smaller pot. Above them is a range hood. On the cutting board lies a knife.

[0-3] The woman pours the soup from the ladle into the pot, sets the ladle down, and glances at the cutting board, her expression turning surprised. The camera cuts to the cutting board, which features a design of two girls with backpacks dancing, surrounded by blades of grass and gift boxes.

[0-3] The woman pours the soup from the ladle into the pot, sets the ladle down, and glances at the cutting board, her expression turning surprised. The camera cuts to the cutting board, which features a design of two girls with backpacks dancing, surrounded by blades of grass and gift boxes.

[3-8] The woman with glasses turns her head and looks at the camera with a surprised expression. The scene changes to a background of cabinets and a sink, where a woman in a green top and a yellow hat stands with scallions tied to her wrists. She holds her hands together, palms open, facing the camera, twisting her body and rotating her wrists.

[8-14] The camera cuts back to the woman with glasses, who throws up her hand in exasperation. The scene shifts back to the woman with the yellow hat, who has now replaced the scallions on her wrists with sausages. After dancing and rotating her wrists back and forth, she twists to the left and mischievously drops the sausages into the pot.
